name: Galactic Garbage Gladiator
description:
This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #20, with the theme of "Absorb." We weren't able to get started until a bit late in the jam, but we still think we came up with something fun - hope you enjoy!

Pick up space trash and absorb it into your barrier, upping your defense and effective amo count. Defeat enemies by shooting them with your collected trash or by knocking asteroids into them!

High scores can get submitted to the LootLocker leaderboard at the end, so do your best and show off your top scores!

Controls:

  • Move with mouse - player space ship will auto-move to your cursor position
  • Absorb trash into your barrier with LMB
  • Fire absorbed trash out of your barrier with 'SPACE'
  • Destroy enemy ships with trash-shots or by knocking asteroids into them!

Pre-made Asset Credits:

  • UI and enemy ship sprites were made by piptastic for a previous game jam
  • All sound came from opengameart.org
    • BGM by centurion_of_war
    • laser SFX by dklon
    • explosion SFX by crazy duck games (requested itch.io credit rather than opengameart.org credit)
    • hit, select, and trash bullet SFX by shiru
  • Retro font came from 1001freefonts.com
